short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Woohoo, just right click on the first and second element to get the relative xpath. Have Fun!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension for finding out relative xpath expression of two web elements.
Just right click on the elements you want to compare, or type in your expression and press enter.
